turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: okay let's start hi i'd like to book a book for three tonight”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! I'd be happy to help you with that. How many people will be in your party for that reservation?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “And maybe just to person.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, two people. And do you have a specific time in mind for that reservation?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Maybe 6 o'clock in the afternoon.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Perfect, 6 o'clock in the evening for two people. Any preference for the type of seating, like indoors or outdoors?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “I want a doctor outdoor sitting and just near the road, please.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Got it, outdoor seating with a nice view of the street. That sounds lovely! Anything else I should note for your reservation, like a special occasion or dietary requests?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Today is my friend's birthday, so I'm booking for her birthday to offer anything in all the decorations.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, that's so sweet! I'll make sure to add a note for the birthday celebration and a special dessert for her. Anything else you'd like to include?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can you put a candle on the dessert?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I'll make sure there's a candle on the dessert for her. That'll be a lovely touch! I think we have everything set. If there's anything else, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oops, I forgot to bring our cake to your restaurant. So, do you have any cakes or some things that are very beautiful for the birthday?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: That sounds wonderful! We do have some lovely cakes that are perfect for a birthday celebration, but you're absolutely welcome to bring your own as well. Just let us know in advance, and we'll make sure everything is set up perfectly for you.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “So could you give me some pictures about the lovely cakes?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I'll make a note of that and we'll ensure everything is ready for the special celebration. If you think of anything else, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, and also I want a romantic table for us because she's my best friend.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Oh, that's lovely! I'll make sure the table is set up to be extra romantic and cozy for the two of you. I think it’s going to be a wonderful evening! If there’s anything else you need, just let me know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Will I get a confirmation message?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, absolutely! I’ll send you a confirmation message with all the details shortly. If you have any other questions in the meantime, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Don't forget to send me some photos about the lovely cakes so I and I will choose one for her birthday.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely, I'll include that in the confirmation as well. That way you'll have all the details and can make your choice easily. Thanks for letting me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Is the menu online or offline?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: We can definitely provide you with an online menu so you can take a look at it at your convenience. I'll include the link in the confirmation as well.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Great, I will see you at 6 tonight.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No problem at all! I'll make sure to send that over to you as soon as possible so you can have a look tonight. If there's anything else you need, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “That's all. Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I'm glad to help. Have a wonderful day, and I'll be in touch soon!
